policyname: Customers can insert messages on their requests
with_check:
((EXISTS ( SELECT 1
   FROM requests
  WHERE ((requests.id = messages.request_id) AND (requests.customer_id = auth.uid())))) AND (sender_type = 'customer'::text) AND (sender_id = auth.uid()))

((EXISTS ( SELECT 1
   FROM profiles
  WHERE ((profiles.id = auth.uid()) AND (profiles.role = 'support'::text)))) AND (sender_type = 'support'::text) AND (sender_id = auth.uid()))

check_expression:
((sender_id = auth.uid()) OR (EXISTS ( SELECT 1
   FROM requests
  WHERE ((requests.id = messages.request_id) AND (requests.customer_id = auth.uid())))) OR (EXISTS ( SELECT 1
   FROM profiles
  WHERE ((profiles.id = auth.uid()) AND (profiles.role = 'support'::text)))))
(((role = 'admin'::text) AND (id = auth.uid())) OR (id = auth.uid()) OR ((role = 'support'::text) AND (id = auth.uid())))

policyname: Support staff can update assigned tickets
check_expression:
((assigned_to = auth.uid()) OR (EXISTS ( SELECT 1
   FROM profiles
  WHERE ((profiles.id = auth.uid()) AND (profiles.role = 'support'::text)))))

((customer_id = auth.uid()) OR (EXISTS ( SELECT 1
   FROM profiles
  WHERE ((profiles.id = auth.uid()) AND ((profiles.role = 'admin'::text) OR (profiles.role = 'support'::text))))))
